author: Erik Ortiz
title: Fear of coronavirus reaching Mississippi prisons worries advocates
description: "Families like mine are begging and praying that this prison doesn't become a death trap," the wife of an inmate at the Mississippi State Penitentiary in Parchman said.
content: Vivian Acevedo's husband is serving a 20-year sentence at the Mississippi State Penitentiary in Parchman, and she anguishes over his safety, she said, "every waking moment." Parchman, the only maximum-security prison for men in the state, has been the focus o… [+6987 chars]
